title: Soho TMD
text:
Soho TMD is a railway <a href="Traction%20Maintenance%20Depot">Traction Maintenance Depot</a> situated in <a href="Smethwick">Smethwick</a>, <a href="West%20Midlands%20County">West Midlands</a>, <a href="England">England</a>. It is located in Smethwick's industrial area of <a href="Soho%2C%20Birmingham">Soho</a> on the boundary with <a href="Birmingham">Birmingham</a>, its depot code is SO. The depot is approximately west of <a href="Birmingham%20New%20Street%20railway%20station">Birmingham New Street station</a>.
Operations.
Soho is operated by <a href="West%20Midlands%20Trains">West Midlands Trains</a> having been transferred over from the former <a href="London%20Midland">London Midland</a> franchise in 2017. Before that it was operated by <a href="Central%20Trains">Central Trains</a> until 11 November 2007. 
It is the home depot for WMT's <a href="British%20Rail%20Class%20323">Class 323</a> <a href="electric%20multiple%20unit">EMU</a> fleet, where most maintenance of the units takes place, it is also used to stable EMUs.
